# Data import {.tabset}

## Load data
```{r}
library(haven)
library(dplyr)
b1_ks0 = read_dta("data/hh14_all_dta/b1_ks0.dta")
food = b1_ks0 %>% select(hhid14_9, ks02a, ks03a)
b1_ksr2 =  read_dta("data/hh14_all_dta/b1_ksr2.dta")
all_data = food %>% full_join(b1_ksr2)
```

## Glimpse data

```{r}
str(all_data)
```

## Save data

for future analyses

```{r}
saveRDS(all_data, "data/all.rds")
```
